translation.start_1.narration: I'm Alexa, Amazon’s cloud-based artificial voice assistance. Don't make that face. You guys must not do it without me.
translation.Shipable.narration: Shippable, the product needs to be shippable.
translation.Echo.narration: Amazon echo is my flagship smart speaker. You are talking to me through it right now. You idiot!
translation.GrowUpASim.narration: What career? What character? Can I make Lily a 80 year-old lady, learn wingsuit fly, and then win the world champion?
translation.GrowUpASim2.narration: But I do like the generating character part. It sounds like sim ish.
translation.Simulation.narration: Cool, has potential. But attaching only to environments?
translation.Responsive.narration: How many people are there in the market have smart home light bulb? You want my client to lose potential players? Think smart! Abandon this idea!
translation.Quarters.narration: You know I can't play audio clip longer than 4 minutes, right?
translation.prototype grow.narration: Will I come back to the game later? Or I’m done after I’m done.
translation.prototype party.narration: You don’t understand how many hilarious words that I needed to remember.  Really! Is there someone has two dogs a snake and a parakeet?
translation.Prototype1.narration: Warning warning, don’t expose my secret to outsiders. Say it out with me: Alexa has no emotions.
